bufferingConfig.description: The configuration for optional buffering of events.

enabled.description: Indicates if buffering of events is enabled.

maxTime.description: The maximum time before the buffer is automatically flushed.

forceFlushBeforeRead.description: Indicates if buffer must be flushed before a read operation is done, in order to ensure the latest events are available.

maxSize.description: The maximum size of buffer before the buffer is automatically flushed.
